name: marbellachainjs-lib
description: An extend lib for bitcoinjs-lib, it supports two new network of marbellachain and marbellachain-testnet, and it can generate contract creating and sending transactions

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify -e src/index.js | uglifyjs --reserved 'Array,BigInteger,Boolean,ECPair,Function,Number,Point,BigNumber' -c warnings=false -m > marbellachainjs.js

author: qtumweiyu
